Name: Heaven Scent
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Honey, vanilla and lemon - reminiscent of a chilled, straight-up toddy.
History: Discovered in 2003 at Oxo Tower Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Heaven Scent contains 199 calories
